nodes.text: Rantorin, also known as OM812, was a barren rock planet with two moons. It occupied the second closest orbital position around the red giant star Thrantin Major in the Thrantin OM81-A system, a part of the Ollonir Boundaries in the Negs portion of the Colonies.

Rantorin was first mentioned in Alliance Intelligence Reports, a 1995 sourcebook for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Thrantin OM81-A system, and therefore Rantorin, in grid square J-9.
